parameters.name: Width
parameters.description: Width of the picture in meters

parameters.name: Height
parameters.description: Height of the picture in meters

parameters.name: AspectRatioLocked
parameters.description: True to keep a fixed width and height aspect ratio, false to not

title: ISketchPicture.SetSize
description: Sets the size of the picture on the sketch.
signature:
System.Boolean SetSize( 
   System.Double
Width
,
   System.Double
Height
,
   System.Boolean
AspectRatioLocked
)

parameters.name: Width
parameters.description: Width of the picture in meters

parameters.name: Height
parameters.description: Height of the picture in meters

parameters.name: AspectRatioLocked
parameters.description: True to keep a fixed width and height aspect ratio, false to not

returns: True if the size of the picture is set, false if not
